name: Animation FX FIRE
description:
This asset pack contains 7 fire animations FX loop sprite sheet + image sequence + gif. 

You can suggest in the comments what you wish i should add in this pack.

Actual Content:
  • Fire
  • Blue
  • Red
  • Black
  • Green
  • Purple
  • Kaleidoscope
